siteTitle: JungleCode - Transforming AI Technology for Japan's Market

hero.title: Transform Your AI in Japan
hero.subtitle: Unlock breakthrough growth in Japan's innovation-ready $9 trillion economy with market-specific strategies.

about.title: AI Innovation Transforms in Japan
about.description: JungleCode unlocks strategic market insights through technology-focused experience. We transform cultural barriers, business norms, and legal frameworks into growth opportunities for your AI venture. Accelerate your market position with future-ready strategies at any development stage.

mission.title: Our Vision
mission.text: To accelerate AI transformation in Japan through forward-thinking partnership and innovation pathways.

keyPoints.title: Cultural Insight
keyPoints.description: We've pioneered technology success in Japan.

keyPoints.title: Trusted Access
keyPoints.description: We connect you to innovation networks.

challenges.title: Transforming Market Challenges
challenges.intro: Japan's innovation landscape presents unique friction points—from technology adoption cycles to future-focused regulations and precision communication. We transform each barrier into competitive advantage through forward-thinking solutions.

challenges.title: Innovation Intelligence
challenges.challenge: It's hard to know what's working — or even who to talk to.
challenges.solution: We help you understand how the market works and where your opportunity actually lies.

challenges.title: Technology Network Access
challenges.challenge: No matter how great your offering is, cold starts rarely go anywhere.
challenges.solution: We bring you into trusted conversations that lead to real traction.

challenges.title: Future-Ready Protocols
challenges.challenge: Even small things — like silence or seating — carry meaning here.
challenges.solution: We coach you on the unspoken rules that build confidence and trust.

challenges.title: Next-Gen Communication
challenges.challenge: Overexplaining can come off as insecure or pushy.
challenges.solution: We help you strike the right balance — clear, calm, and intentional.

challenges.title: Compliance Advancement
challenges.challenge: The rules aren't always obvious — until they stop your momentum.
challenges.solution: We give you clarity early, so you can move forward without worry.

challenges.title: Trust Technology
challenges.challenge: Japan expects more than just a good product — they expect reliability.
challenges.solution: We help you show you're serious — and build the kind of trust that lasts.

services.title: Transformation Services
services.subtitle: We accelerate your technology journey—from market strategy to innovation partnerships and future growth.

whyJapan.title: Japan's Innovation Landscape
whyJapan.intro: Japan represents a technology-forward economy with next-generation infrastructure, innovation frameworks, and digital transformation appetite perfect for future-focused expansion.

sections.title: Technology Market Dynamics
items: $9T economy with deep investments in automation and productivity
Large enterprise sector seeking scalable, long-term solutions
Strong alignment between public policy and innovation
Tech-savvy buyers who demand precision and trust
Strategic entry point for expansion across Asia

sections.title: Innovation Advantages
items: High IP protection and low tolerance for bad actors
Government support for AI-driven transformation
Reliable, modern infrastructure across industries
High brand loyalty for trusted partners
Premium pricing accepted for proven performance

sections.title: Transformation Factors
items: Long-term partnerships built on credibility
High standards for transparency and reliability
Deep respect for quality, ethics, and craft
Preference for structured onboarding and integration
Clear expectations for support, compliance, and continuity

getStarted.title: Transform Your Market Reach
getStarted.subtitle: Take the first step toward technology transformation with future-focused Japan strategy.

consultationSteps.title: Transformation Blueprint

team.name: Jet Villegas
team.bio: Technology pioneer with 6+ years transforming global engineering from Tokyo. Developed next-generation platforms reaching billions worldwide. Accelerates AI technology adoption through Japan-specific innovation frameworks.

team.name: Aditya Pandya
team.bio: Digital transformation leader with 5+ years revolutionizing products from Japan. Scaled platform technology to 2.1B annual applications. Pioneers AI product innovation strategies for future-focused Japanese market entry.
